alert.note: Alert for Guadalupe and Delaware Mountains (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Midland-Odessa (Western Texas and Southeastern New Mexico)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 29 at 3:37PM CDT by NWS Midland-Odessa
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Culberson County through 415 PM CDT... At 336 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles south of Pine Springs, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Guadalupe Mountains National Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
